mapper.select: select e.es_no, e.mem_no, c.cm_no,m.mem_name,c.CM_NAME,hn.hn_notititle,e.ES_REGDATE,e.es_confirm, e.es_status from emp_sup e left join member m on e.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO left join hire_noti hn on e.HN_NO = hn.HN_NO left join comp_member c on hn.CM_NO = c.CM_NO where e.es_delflag = 'N' and c.cm_no = #{cmNo}
